description: An adapter allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight onto a common Picatinny rail.  This being a low mount, it allows the user to reduce the amount of space their gun takes, in exchange for slightly more effort while aiming.

name.str: Trijicon RM35 RMR mount for ACOG

description: A specialized mount allowing one to install a popular Trijicon RMR red dot sight on top of an equally-popular Trijicon ACOG TA01 sight.  This enables usage of different sights for different distances, potentially making aiming quicker and more precise overall.
